mil6.2.8:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ye te ahesuṁ tikicchakānaṁ pubbakā ācariyā seyyathidaṁ—
mil6.2.8:1.2_0: nārado dhammantarī aṅgiraso kapilo kaṇḍaraggi sāmo atulo pubbakaccāyano, sabbepete
mil6.2.8:1.2_1: ācariyā sakiṁyeva roguppattiñca nidānañca sabhāvañca samuṭṭhānañca tikicchañca kiriyañca
mil6.2.8:1.2_2: siddhāsiddhañca sabbaṁ taṁ niravasesaṁ jānitvā ‘imasmiṁ kāye ettakā rogā uppajjissantī’ti
mil6.2.8:1.2_3: ekappahārena kalāpaggāhaṁ karitvā suttaṁ bandhiṁsu, asabbaññuno ete sabbe, kissa
mil6.2.8:1.2_4: pana tathāgato sabbaññū samāno anāgataṁ kiriyaṁ buddhañāṇena jānitvā ‘ettake nāma
mil6.2.8:1.2_5: vatthusmiṁ ettakaṁ nāma sikkhāpadaṁ paññapetabbaṁ bhavissatī’ti paricchinditvā anavasesato
mil6.2.8:1.2_6: sikkhāpadaṁ na paññapesi, uppannuppanne vatthusmiṁ ayase pākaṭe dose vitthārike puthugate
mil6.2.8:1.2_7: ujjhāyantesu manussesu tasmiṁ tasmiṁ kāle sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññapesī”ti?
mil6.2.8:2.1_0: “Ñātametaṁ, mahārāja, tathāgatassa ‘imasmiṁ samaye imesu manussesu sādhikaṁ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṁ
mil6.2.8:2.1_1: paññapetabbaṁ bhavissatī’ti, api ca tathāgatassa evaṁ ahosi ‘sace kho ahaṁ sādhikaṁ
mil6.2.8:2.1_3: idha rakkhitabbaṁ, dukkaraṁ vata bho samaṇassa gotamassa sāsane pabbajitun”ti, pabbajitukāmāpi
mil6.2.8:2.1_4: na pabbajissanti, vacanañca me na saddahissanti, asaddahantā te manussā apāyagāmino
mil6.2.8:2.1_5: bhavissanti uppannuppanne vatthusmiṁ dhammadesanāya viññāpetvā pākaṭe dose sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmī’”ti.
mil6.2.8:3.1_0: “Acchariyaṁ, bhante nāgasena, buddhānaṁ, abbhutaṁ, bhante nāgasena, buddhānaṁ, yāva
mil6.2.8:3.1_1: mahantaṁ tathāgatassa sabbaññutañāṇaṁ, evametaṁ, bhante nāgasena, suniddiṭṭho eso
mil6.2.8:3.1_2: attho tathāgatena, ‘bahukaṁ idha sikkhitabban’ti sutvā sattānaṁ santāso uppajjeyya,
mil6.2.8:3.1_3: ekopi jinasāsane na pabbajeyya, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
